survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with On-Site Childcare Facilities Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from employees regarding their satisfaction with the on-site childcare facilities provided by the company, to identify areas for improvement and ensure the needs of working parents are met.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of on-site childcare facilities at your workplace?
questions.routing_logic: This question is presented to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity and ease of analysis. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of on-site childcare facilities at your workplace?
script.routing_logic: This question is presented to all respondents.

questions.question_text: Which of the following amenities do you find most valuable in the on-site childcare facility? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question is presented to respondents who indicated 'Satisfied' or higher in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse preferences. Include an 'Other' option for additional feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice). Include an open-text field if 'Other' is selected.

script.question_text: Which of the following amenities do you find most valuable in the on-site childcare facility? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: This question is presented to respondents who indicated 'Satisfied' or higher in Q1.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the on-site childcare facility?
questions.routing_logic: This question is presented to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended questions can provide nuanced insights. Encourage detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the on-site childcare facility?
script.routing_logic: This question is presented to all respondents.

questions.question_text: How often do you use the on-site childcare facility?
questions.routing_logic: This question is presented to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Frequency data will help assess utilization rates.

script.question_text: How often do you use the on-site childcare facility?
script.routing_logic: This question is presented to all respondents.

questions.question_text: Would you recommend the on-site childcare facility to a colleague?
questions.routing_logic: This question is presented to respondents who indicated they use the facility ('Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly') in Q4.
questions.client_notes: A simple yes/no/unsure question can gauge overall satisfaction.

script.question_text: Would you recommend the on-site childcare facility to a colleague?
script.routing_logic: This question is presented to respondents who indicated they use the facility ('Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly') in Q4.
